paths.name: d8-coder-path
paths.title: Drupal 8: Developing your first modules
paths.description: Get started with the basics of module development on Drupal 8, the most successful open-source CMS in the past decade. Then get into the details like annotation-based plugins, incorporating 3rd-party PHP and JS libraries, understanding dependency injection through the services, and find out how to continue your learning.
